item.title: About Me
item.description:
Who am I ?

Welcome to my site! I’m a final year undergrad doing my BE in Computer Science from SSN College of Engineering, Chennai. I will be pursuing my Ph.D. in Informatics at Penn State University from Fall 2021 as a member of the PIKE research group. I will be co-advised by Prof. Dongwon Lee and Prof. Sharon Huang. My primary field of interest is Artifical Intelligence with focus on areas such as Computer Vision, Deep Learning and NLP. I also enjoy the sport of Competitive Programming by participating in challenges such as the Google Foo.bar Challenge. I’m currently working on projects in the domains of Deep Learning based Fingerprint Matching, 3D Object Recognition/Tracking and Real Time Visual Navigation on Edge Devices. I’m always looking to meet and talk to people working in the areas of my interest so if you would like to work with me or get to know me better, drop me an email or ping me on LinkedIn ðŸ˜„

My Skills

  • Programming Languages
    • Python
    • Java
    • C/C++
  • ML/DL Tools
    • OpenCV
    • TensorFlow
    • PyTorch
    • Scikit-Learn
  • Web Development
    • FastAPI
    • HTML/CSS
    • NodeJS
  • App Development
    • Flutter
    • Android App Development
